publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3464 Alex Neil: Public Holidays—That the Parliament calls for legislative responsibility for enforcing the observation of holidays in Scotland to be delegated from Westminster to itself.
S2M-3464 Public Holidays (lodged on 25 October 2005) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3464 Alex Neil: Public Holidays—That the Parliament calls for legislative responsibility for enforcing the observation of holidays in Scotland to be delegated from Westminster to itself. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
S2M-3464 Public Holidays (lodged on 25 October 2005) John Swinburne*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3464 Public Holidays (lodged on 25 October 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3464 Public Holidays (lodged on 25 October 2005) Dennis Canavan*
